name: A regular game about saving your lover
name_original: A regular game about saving your lover
description:
An adventure game where you can explore the mansion of a Dark Lord. As a man with no super power, you must find your way through trickery and negotiation. There are many things to explore and many way to save your love. The game has different endings and with each ending you achieve, you may find a clue on how to achieve another endings.

STORY:

Your lover has been kidnapped by  a  vampire. You traced him down  to his mansion. Tonight is Halloween and the vampire is going to held a party.  This is only chance for you to save your princess. 

However, you are only a regular human with no super power or super weapon. Can you discover the mansion's secrets and rescue your true love? 

FEATURES

-Classic rpg gameplay.

-Explore a huge mansion with many secrets

-Multiple endings

-Multiple way to accomplish a tasks so find your own way in this adventure

CREDIT 

The game was made by me phamtranducanh for the Scream Jam 2020. It was made under 10 days for Scream Jam 2020 using RPG Maker Mv. Most of the tools, music and asset I used belong to  Kadokawa Corpotation.
